thread.section_title: United Capital Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of United Capital Source | unitedcapitalsource.com
thread.title: S Fortner
thread.title_full: United Capital Source reviewed by S Fortner

author: S Fortner
title: S Fortner
text: United Capital Source was there for me when I needed to expand my business by adding a significant amount of inventory. Jon Schmink laid out everything I needed to get funded. I sent Jon the information the same day, and my business was funded the next day. The process was easy, and I was able to send everything from my office within hours. I was approved within an hour. My credit is OK, but nothing to write home about. I appreciate Jon and his team taking such great care of me and my business.
